title: Dinnerbone：今天正在全力制作1.9版本
author: 修改器很好玩
txt_content:
本帖最后由 修改器很好玩 于 2015-1-21 20:14 编辑 
Had a super productive day today working on fun 1.9 stuffs. I am so excited to work on it, I'm pretty sure most of you guys will love it.

The only hint I will give you today is that this update is for the players. Or, perhaps, it may be more accurate to say, against.
Dinnerbone: 今天制作1.9的我很高产啊。我太激动了。我敢打赌你们一定会喜欢这个新版本的。                  
唯一给你们的提示：这次更新与玩家有关。更精确地说，会让玩家更难生存。







@a20001017
